text:
I need to find
my missing piece.

♪ And be more
than a mystery ♪
( roaring )

Nice, Shrimpy.
Good, Shrimpy.

Do you want a treat Shrimpy?
What do shrimp like for treats?
Try your cheese.

I don't know if I'm ready
to share my cheese.
( melodic howling )
( melodic howling )

It's going to take all of us
to bring him down.

Join us!
You'll feel what to do.
( melodic howling )
( melodic howling )

- ( laughing )
- Yes!

- All right!
- Yes!

No more monster!
Seabrook is safe.
Aww, he's kind of cute

when he's not trying
to stomp us to a pulp.

And actually, he was perfect
just the way he was.

But the dance. What a mess.
I'm sorry, Addison.

Even my electric barrier
couldn't stop him.

This looks even
more spooky than before!
It's perfect.

Howl with me again,
but let's keep it light.
( melodic howling )

Whoa. This is even more
exciting than my cheese.

So, yeah, Addison
pretty much saved the day.

Are you surprised?
I'm not surprised.

It wouldn't be
a Seabrook celebration

without
a little monster mystery.
Hey, skelly man, let's dance.

♪ Tonight's
the spookiest night ♪

♪ It's time to come alive,
alive, alive ♪

♪ Full moon's got us
feeling all right ♪

♪ Dressed up to the nine,
it's a vibe ♪

♪ Zombies, werewolves,
it's our time ♪

♪ Frightening,
but make it look fly ♪
♪ Hands to the sky ♪

♪ Not scared of
what's in front of me ♪

♪ We're still gon' celebrate,
gon' celebrate ♪
♪ The scariest of days ♪

♪ Seabrook
is full of monsters ♪

♪ We ain't scared,
yeah, everybody's welcome ♪

♪ Shrimpy in the house,
la la la la, la la la la ♪

♪ Turn that
superstition up loud ♪
♪ La la la la, la la la la ♪

♪ Let's get terrified,
S-H-R-I-M-P-Y ♪

♪ Shrimpy in the house,
la la la la, la la la la ♪
♪ La la, la la la la ♪

♪ In the house, in the house,
Shrimpy in the house ♪
♪ La la, la la la la ♪

♪ In the house, in the house,
Shrimpy in the house ♪
( teeth chattering )
